Articles.Content:
So, I need your help.

I search pretty large and high res version of the logo of the companies of ksp (mainly Jeb's Junkyard)

I need them to put them on rc planes, im pretty sure there would be no downside of it.

Thank you for your help, I will make Jeb proud!
I think the person you want to ping is @KasperVld? He'd know if there was any issues with using the logos of the KSP companies on your RC planes.
